high_descs: turn left to face the bed
pick up the book that is on the bed
turn right to face the desk, hold book up to lamp
anns.task_desc: examine the book with the lamp

high_descs: Turn left to face the bed.
Pick up the book from the middle of the bed.
Turn right to face the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Look at a book under a lit lamp.

high_descs: Move to the bed on your left.
Pick up the Computer Vision book on the bed.
Bring the book to the lamp on the desk, to the right of the bed.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine the book by the light of the lamp on the desk.
